title: FAA to Keep Tight Watch on Boeing Employees Who Represent Regulators; Agency grants three-year renewal of regulatory authority, rejecting Boeing's request for a more typical five-year extension
text:
"After careful consideration of your request for a five year renewal period, we have determined that a three year authorization is more appropriate," the FAA said in its letter sent Tuesday. "There are multiple in work improvements that the FAA would like to assess within the Boeing organization over the next three years."

(More to come)

Write to Andrew Tangel at Andrew.Tangel@wsj.com

FAA to Keep Tight Watch on Boeing Employees Who Represent Regulators
